pullRequest.title: collecting classes for same application in same package
pullRequest.bodyText:
..before, it was all routes in one package, all pojos in one package etc
Now it's e.g. all the stepcom.code in one package

commit.message:
collecting classes for same application in same package

..before, it was all routes in one package, all pojos in one package etc
Now it's e.g. all the stepcom.code in one package
clean out some very old types and verify it still compiles

bring the current schema as exported by metasfresh...

 manually remove redundant minOccurs and maxOccurs

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/intensive_care_uat' into invisible_croissant_uat_move_edi_classes

# Conflicts:
#	misc/services/edi/pom.xml
Merge branch 'master' into invisible_croissant_uat_move_edi_classes
fix for enforcer RequirePluginVersions rule

start making the target clearing center configurable via...

 desadv and invoic properties
move stuff around some more
minor
slightly rearranging properties
renaming some properties
fix after-rename-compile-error
fix wrt missing marshaling
fix route-id
manually copy the changes from master
manually sync updated parent pom from master
in the process of upgrading camel-edi to 3.4.0
move edi to be paralel to shipping
solve compile issues etc
re-add plugin, bc it's used
attempt to update docker java version

camel-shipping: remove accidentally(?) added dependency

also, in parent-pom: define "env" for the case of local (-non-jenkins) builds
push test stub

Fix extends schema.xsd, fix EcosioDesadvRoute; also:

* fix the test at EcosioDesadvRouteTest
* schema.xsd: add EDI_ImpC_OLCands parent and desadv-Dropship_Location_ID element
* AddressQual: add javadoc from stepcom-documentation
* C_Async_Batch: whitespace-only
* other changes: refactor Constants.EP_AMQP_TO_MF to be feasible for testing
fix EcosioInvoicRoute and test

Add dropship-fields to desadv

#7085

set Dropship location when creating new desadv record

#7085

add unit test and support for splitting C_OLCands

#7085

update jacoco-maven-plugin version to 0.8.5

hopefully it will work with java 14, thx to https://stackoverflow.com/a/61154016/1012103

#7085

also restore building the uber-jar (for now)

#7085

fix typo in XSD-File

#7085

fix startup script

#7085

use latest APM agent, hoping it works with java-14

#7085

add missing smooks-dependency; start test for compudata-orders

#7085

work on a unit test for fixed-lenght ORDERS

#7085

add previously missing smooks dependency

#7085

change field length of applicationRef

looks like the following fields where mored, and the like is 2 chars longer than was implied by the field length sum
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/intensive_care_uat' into invisible_croissant_uat_move_edi_classes

adopt code to new XSD

..and do numerous small code improvements

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7085

stop trying to fix 3rd-party dependency convergence errors

 also use camel-*-starter dependecies

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7085

different fixes

* fix (remove) incorrect DateFormat attribute when exporting xsd-date*
* go back to using xsd:date and datetime (->XMLGregorianCalendar) for e.g. MovementDate
* when importing ecosio olcand-xml, then supplement e.g. AD_Client_Value from application.properties
* add additional address to olcand XML import format

#7085
minor

specify ecosio file names and fix error via streamCaching

#7085

fix deprecated method call in ExcelOLCandRoute

#7085
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/intensive_care_uat' into invisible_croissant_uat_move_edi_classes

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/intensive_care_uat' into invisible_croissant_uat_move_edi_classes
